programme.title: Mixed Doubles Bronze Medal Match - Curling | Beijing 2022 Replays
programme.desc: This event took place on 08/02/2022 at the Nat. Aquatics Ctr - Sheet B. Oskar Eriksson and Almida de Val (SWE) won the match and took home Bronze while Jennifer Dodds and Bruce Mouat (GBR) ended up in the 4th place.

programme.title: ITA-NOR - Mixed Doubles Gold Medal Match - Curling | Beijing 2022 Replays
programme.desc: This event took place on 08/02/2022 at the Nat. Aquatics Ctr - Sheet B. Final Score: ITA 8:5 NOR. Italy won the final and took home Gold, Norway Silver and Sweden completed the podium

programme.desc: This event took place on 02/08/2021 at the Ariake Gymnastics Centre, Tokyo. Liu (CHN) claimed the Gold in the Men's Rings, Carey (USA) in the Women's Floor and Shin (KOR) in the Men's Vault.

programme.title: Sliding Madness | A journey on Luge, Speed Skating, Skeleton & Monobob tracks
programme.desc: St. Moritz, Switzerland, January 2020, the Winter Youth Olympic Games. Skeleton, Luge, Speed Skating and Monobob are the four disciplines that are hosted in the Alpine village. Teenage athletes from all around the globe participate for the first time in an Olympic Games, not only the competition is important to them, the friendship between Teams, the camaraderie and the Olympic Spirit embrace these young athletes during these Games leaving them all with an unforgettable experience.
